sentences.en: After passing the relatively light season opening, Aituoao erupts comprehensively afterward.
sentences.cn: 在度过了相对平淡的赛季开局后, 埃托奥随后全面爆发.

sentences.en: Applying multi - goal fuzzy optimum seeking model to composite appraisal of performance comprehensively.
sentences.cn: 把 多目标 模糊优选模型应用于复合材料综合性能的评价.

sentences.en: Comprehensively , magnesium hydroxide filling amount of 100 was the best recommended value.
sentences.cn: 所以综合各因素考虑,氢氧化镁添加量为100份时最适宜.

sentences.en: Comprehensively push forward administration by law, regulate law enforcement behavior.
sentences.cn: 全面推进依法行政, 规范执法行为.

sentences.en: England were comprehensively beaten by South Africa.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队被南非队彻底打败。

sentences.en: Last recommendation well are proposed basing on being made research comprehensively.
sentences.cn: 在综合研究这些方法的基础上,提出建议井位.

sentences.en: Our football team was comprehensively ( ie thoroughly ) defeated.
The crux of the matter is how to comprehensively treat this trend.
sentences.cn: 问题的关键是要全面地看待这种趋势.

sentences.en: The equipment to test missile comprehensively is called missile test system generally.
sentences.cn: 实施综合测试的设备,通常称作导弹测试系统.

sentences.en: The new Law on Corporate Income Tax will be comprehensively enforced.
sentences.cn: 全面实施新的企业所得税法.

sentences.en: The ore control factor of the Huangshashi copper - lead - deposit was analyzed comprehensively.
sentences.cn: 综合分析黄沙寺铜 - 铅 - 锌矿床的控矿因素.

sentences.en: The people's court shall collect and examine evidence comprehensively and objectivedly.
sentences.cn: 人民法院应当全面,客观地搜集和调查证据.

sentences.en: The Securities Act of 1933 comprehensively regulated the securities industry.
sentences.cn: 1933年的证券法案广泛地规范了证券产业.

sentences.en: The whole structure, and hardware design in the system are comprehensively described.

sentences.en: They were comprehensively beaten in the final.
sentences.cn: 他们在决赛中一败涂地。
